com.nokia.places.request

Interface CategoryRequest

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Request

    public interface CategoryRequest
extends Request
    This interface represents a query which returns a collection of categories. Each Category can then be used as an optional filter on a subsequent ResultPageRequest, since every Place is assigned to one or more categories.

    The following query retrieves all Categories available in central Berlin, which may then be used to filter subsequent results. 


    
 GeoCoordinate BERLIN  = new GeoCoordinate(52.500556, 13.398889, 0);
 CategoryRequest.getCategories(BERLIN);

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.nokia.places.request.Request

    • Method Detail

      • getCategories

        Category[] getCategories(GeoCoordinate at)
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                ServiceError
        This method makes a request for appropriate categories based around a single location. The call to RESTful Places service is made synchronously, and therefore blocks further operations until the request is complete.
        Parameters:
        at - An object containing the coordinates of an arbitrary location to obtain categories from.
        Returns:
        An array containing all categories which may be used to filter a subsequent ResultPageRequest
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on I/O errors
        ServiceError - on service errors

      • getCategories

        void getCategories(GeoCoordinate at,
                 CategoryRequestListener listener)
        This method makes a request for appropriate categories based around a single location. The call to RESTful Places service is made asynchronously, and therefore does not block.
        Parameters:
        at - An object containing the coordinates of an arbitrary location to obtain categories from.
        listener - a pair of callback functions, one of which shall be called once the request has completed. The listener contains either the result of the request or the error should one occur.
